sentences.en: " No need to be sarcastic, Dorothy.
sentences.cn: “ 用不着说风凉话, 多罗西. ”

sentences.en: [ Enthusiastic outburst of sarcastic applause ] That seems to be all.
sentences.cn: ( 热烈的讥讽喝彩声轰然响起 ) 好像就是这么多了.

sentences.en: A sarcastic remark was on the tip of her tongue.
sentences.cn: 挖苦的话到了她嘴边却没说出来。

sentences.en: Destiny stands by sarcastic with our dramatis person folded in her hand.
sentences.cn: 命运之神把我们的剧中人握在她的手里,正冷眼旁观呢.

sentences.en: He chopped in with a sarcastic remark.
sentences.cn: 他突然插进一句讽刺话.

sentences.en: He is a bit dim about her sarcastic remarks.
sentences.cn: 他不太领会她的挖苦话.

sentences.en: He turned to me with a superior and sarcastic smile.
sentences.cn: 他向我转过身来,脸上露出一种傲慢的、嘲讽的微笑.

sentences.en: I squashed him with a sarcastic remark.
sentences.cn: 我说了一句讽刺的话把他给镇住了.

sentences.en: It's entirely groundless that you put on the sarcastic stop.
sentences.cn: 你发出讽刺的调子是毫无根据的.

sentences.en: Judge grew sarcastic as he wiped his face, and caught their remarks.
sentences.cn: 裘德一面用手抹睑,一面觉得应该挖苦挖苦她们, 所以就接着她们的话碴儿说.

sentences.en: She poked fun at people's shortcomings with sarcastic remarks.
sentences.cn: 她冷嘲热讽地拿别人的缺点开玩笑。

sentences.en: The beautifully cut mouth had a proud and somewhat sarcastic expression.
sentences.cn: 那张精雕细琢的嘴巴带着一种傲慢而略含讽刺的表情.

sentences.en: They resented his bantering remarks because they thought he was being sarcastic.
sentences.cn: 他们对他的开玩笑很不满意,他们认为他在挖苦人.

sentences.en: When he came, he was silent and moody, and after a few sarcastic remarks he went away.
sentences.cn: 他来时默默无言,郁郁不乐, 冷嘲热讽一通之后就走了.

trans.tran_en: saying things that are the opposite of what you mean, in order to make an unkind joke or to show that you are annoyed
